column5: This Vacation home is an upscale 4 bedroom 3 bath gorgeous waterfront home. It has a unique location right at the mouth of the bay which allows for spectacular water views and premier fishing. It is located in a prime fishing location with a lighted fishing dock and private boat launch. It is 5 minutes to downtown Rockport, Rockport's Blue Wave beach, upscale shopping and dining, community pool, parks and golf course. It has upscale coastal d√©cor, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops
